episodes.title: Cult Leader Accused of Rape, 'Revenge Porn' on Former Member
episodes.description:
#NextLiveTrial: Accused cult leader Eligio Bishop faces a jury on rape and false imprisonment charges after allegedly posting revenge porn of a former female member. Bishop's "Carbon Nation" group are believers in nudism, veganism, and members are required to give all financial information to him.

00:00 Eligio Bishop Background
02:16 Opening Statements
08:59 Expert Analysis

#CourtTV Catch up on the Polygamist Cult Leader Trial here:
https://www.courttv.com/news/ga-v-eligio-bishop-polygamist-cult-leader-trial/

#eligio

episodes.title: What to Expect at Chad Daybell's Trial
episodes.description:
Judge Steven Boyce ruled Wednesday that cameras will be allowed in the Doomsday Cult Prophet Murder case. With the announcement to broadcast Chad Daybell's trial, a look at what we can expect to see when it starts.

#CourtTV What do YOU think? Will #LoriVallow be made to testify? ⚖️

00:00 CAMERAS IN THE COURTROOM 
21:07 LORI'S SENTENCING & THE DEATH PENALTY
32:04 WHO IS THE LEADER? 

MORE HERE: https://www.courttv.com/tag/chad-daybell/
